thread.section_title: EnjoyCPR Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of EnjoyCPR | enjoycpr.com
thread.title: Aty Wicks

author: Aty Wicks
title: Aty Wicks
text:
Greatly appreciated course being available on a Saturday 9 am-12 .
Appreciated the set up of the course , practice dummy's placed on tables versus having to get on and off floor. I have bad knees and back. First CPR course were I did not leave in pain. Also Comfortable chairs .
The instructor Ben communicated well, answered all questions and presented examples well. I will definitely return every 2 years for my CPR renewal. I would highly recommend course. Due to the neighborhood being congested definitely allow extra time to find a non meter parking space.
